channel.title: Need a free sig?!
channel.description:
I am taking all requests for sigs, banners, and anything else you want made. Post the size, theme/look, text, and what picture you would like on it. If you say "do what ever you think looks good" or "surprise me" i wont make it because what i think looks good and what you think looks good is probly going to be diffrent. I will also have some sigs posted here, if you want it i will remove it and change the text to what you want, and dont foget about the ++ button ;)
http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/7176/poornoobfamilyguy1ro.jpg http://img123.imageshack.us/img123/2721/simpsons0mf.jpg this one is alright if anyone wants.. ^ http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/7756/raiderforums1za.jpg this is only a example of a banner i made. ^

item.title: Need a free sig?!
item.dc:creator: @poor_noob poor noob
item.description:
@poor_noob wrote:

well if I am bored and im trying to improve some skills, ill rember to use a halo picture and post it. and your welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a free sig?!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Hey that's gretty good! Thanks!

EDIT If you want to make me a bigger one, that's fine, but i'm not requesting it. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Need a free sig?!
item.dc:creator: @poor_noob poor noob
item.description:
@poor_noob wrote:

yeah thats the thing, the size. Its hard to make a pic that small with all that cool stuff in it. if you wanted a sig i could do it though. but ill give it a shot and see if not ill just make something that i think still looks good.
edit well thats something, I know its not what you asked for but you might like it i donno =\ Its hard to make small things, if you dont like it i can change it. oh yeah i didnt put a black background because you couldent see the picture.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a free sig?!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Oh the text whatever you can see good and the background black with some cool streaks like you did for "Raider Forums" and some cool text like you did on there too, if you think it will fit in. Thanks alot man!

Read full topic

item.title: Need a free sig?!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Sweet, I suck at making sigs. Well could you make me a sig that's 92*92 pixles (for an msn messenger display pic)? Any cool picture from halo (I don't know any, but they look cool,=P). And the background black with (I know you don't want me to say this, but) some streaks or something that look cool. I definately won't care! Well thanks alot if you're up to making it! Oh yea, and for text, can you put "I don't really care!" please?

Read full topic
